file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: NLP Service REST API
  description: "Description of the initial NLP Service REST API. \n You can find out\
    \ more the application at [http://github.com/CogStack/nlp-rest-service](http://github.com/CogStack/nlp-rest-service)."
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
  version: 0.1.0
externalDocs:
  description: Find out more about NLP Service
  url: http://github.com/CogStack/nlp-rest-service
servers:
- url: ///api
tags:
- name: info
  description: Informative only
- name: process
  description: Processing the documents
- name: single-doc
  description: Processing a single document at once
- name: bulk-docs
  description: Processing multiple documents in bulk
paths:
  /info:
    get:
      tags:
      - info
      summary: Display information about the NLP application
      operationId: info
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/NlpApplicationInformation'
  /process:
    post:
      tags:
      - process
      - single-doc
      summary: Process the content -- single document at once
      operationId: process
      requestBody:
        description: The content of the document to process
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ServiceRequestContent'
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ServiceResponseContent'
        400:
          description: Empty or invalid payload supplied
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ServiceResponseContent'
        500:
          description: Internal error occured while processing the payload
          content: {}
  /process_bulk:
    post:
      tags:
      - process
      - bulk-docs
      summary: Process the content -- documents in bulk
      operationId: process_bulk
      requestBody:
        description: The content to documents to process
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ServiceRequestContentBulk'
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ServiceResponseContentBulk'
        400:
          description: Empty or invalid payload supplied
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ServiceResponseContentBulk'
        500:
          description: Internal error occured while processing the payload
          content: {}
components:
  schemas:
    GenericParameters:
      type: object
      additionalProperties:
        type: object
    ServiceRequestContentBulk:
      type: object
      properties:
        content:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/NlpInputPayload'
        applicationParams:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GenericParameters'
    GenericMetadata:
      type: object
      additionalProperties:
        type: object
    NlpInputPayload:
      type: object
      properties:
        text:
          type: string
        metadata:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GenericMetadata'
        footer:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GenericMetadata'
    NlpApplicationInformation:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        version:
          type: string
        language:
          type: string
        parameters:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GenericParameters'
    ServiceResponseContent:
      type: object
      properties:
        result:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/NlpProcessingResult'
    ServiceResponseContentBulk:
      type: object
      properties:
        result:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/NlpProcessingResult'
    NlpProcessingResult:
      type: object
      properties:
        text:
          type: string
        annotations:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/GenericAnnotation'
        metadata:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GenericMetadata'
        success:
          type: boolean
        errors:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProcessingError'
        footer:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GenericMetadata'
    ProcessingError:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
    GenericAnnotation:
      type: object
      additionalProperties:
        type: object
    ServiceRequestContent:
      type: object
      properties:
        content:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/NlpInputPayload'
        applicationParams:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GenericParameters'
